info.author: Martin Sandve Alnaes, Anders Logg, Kent-Andre Mardal, Ola Skavhaug and Hans Petter Langtangen
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v2 (GPLv2)
info.description: UFC (Unified Form-assembly Code) is a unified framework for finite element assembly. More precisely, it defines a fixed interface for communicating low level routines (functions) for evaluating and assembling finite element variational forms. The UFC interface consists of a single header file ufc.h that specifies a C++ interface that must be implemented by code that complies with the UFC specification.
info.name: UFC
info.summary: unified code generation interface for form-compilers
info.html_description: UFC (Unified Form-assembly Code) is a unified framework for finite element assembly. More precisely, it defines a fixed interface for communicating low level routines (functions) for evaluating and assembling finite element variational forms. The UFC interface consists of a single header file ufc.h that specifies a C++ interface that must be implemented by code that complies with the UFC specification.
